content.description: Climb the crack in the center of the small boulder.
content.location: The smaller of the two boulders next to the river.

content.description:
Start in the undercling and go up to the lip, work right to the high jug and use a left toe to mantle. AVOID the jug on the left at the top -

it is loose

.
content.protection: pads and a good spotter on the rock behind the climb
content.location: On the backside of the large boulder; behind Fish Stix.

content.description: Climb the left side of the smaller boulder next to the river, to the right of the crack.
content.location: Stand start on the left and make a few powerful moves to gain the topout.

content.description: Crouch start at the bottom of the crack to the right of the pit. Use liebacking and toe hooks in the crack (or some other technique!) to ascend the crack and top out. Short but tough.
content.protection: Logs covering pit; folded pad in the hole above logs; larger pad above the folded pad.
content.location: In the forest, uphill from the salmon boulders area. Just uphill and to the right from Forager, around the corner. Continue up past Salmon Revolutions which is located on the the backside of the big fish bones boulder (fish stix on the front / river side).

content.description:
Stand start with a right undercling and left crimp (possibly loose flake!! be careful), and either use an intermediate or dyno to the top jug. Exciting topout.

A sit start might be possible at a harder grade.
content.location: Up the hill, slightly left (if facing uphill) from Salmon Revolutions.

content.description:
Excellent

holds below lead to much sketchier climbing up high. Several foot holds have broken off the climb during repeat attempts. Proceed with caution. Also take care and avoid a large loose block to the right at the top!

Possibly best to avoid this climb in favor of others?
content.location: The line on the right of the large iconic boulder.

content.description: Hang/campus start matched, just above the lip, and campus to the jug. Top out with finesse.
content.location: The right side of the smaller boulder, to the right of the Salmon Run crack.
